name: Novastella Island
description:
CAUTION: THIS GAME IS A SLOW-PACED BUILDING/EXPLORING GAME, PLEASE THINK TWICE BEFORE PURCHASING.

You've accidentally traveled to another universe and landed on an island. The landscape is magnificent, and the resources here are so vast. You want to find a way back but have to put in a lot of work. Get the stuff you need, build the tools, catch some fish, cut the trees, and mine the ground. Just don't forget to enjoy your life on this exotic island. Make some friends while you are here - the local species, the Lilles are very friendly and will help you build your house and decorate it here.

FEATURES

  • Build a home here! There are tons of choices for you. Customized appearance, variable components, and so many choices of decoration that all for your to try.

  • Exquisite characters made in cel-shading style, each character has a variety of outfits/attire to choose from!

  • Meet some new friends here. The Lilles are so cute and huggable, you just want to be with them all day. Also, don't forget to help them, they'll reward you for that.

  • Explore the lands and have an audience with the goddesses of elements of this island. Let them guide your way home!
